TopicTitle: Finance Mod? is there such a thing?

Articles.Content:
Unsure if this is in the correct place but im looking for a sort of financial mod that documents how much your spending each launch and how much was recovered (im using Stage Recovery)

does any one know if something like this exists?
I always used paper, pencil, and my calculator for things like that. The disadvantage is that it makes your room messy.

> 
> I always used paper, pencil, and my calculator for things like that. The disadvantage is that it makes your room messy.

Haha I have thought about that! Surely there's some sort of mod for this?
I've resorted to using a spreadsheet for this.

I'd be somewhat interested in this kind of mod. Then you can see how efficient your launches are, perhaps even track the contracts value fulfilled by a launch. My last spaceplane launch cost me about 8000 kash (sorry). But that doesn't include the contract and recovery of a stranded kerbal/pod (in progress)
